symptoms.name: Elevated blood pressure
symptoms.severity: Variable, depending on the stage of hypertension

symptoms.name: Shortness of breath (dyspnea)
symptoms.pattern: Can be present in advanced stages with heart involvement

symptoms.name: Orthopnea
symptoms.pattern: Can be present in advanced stages with heart involvement

symptoms.name: Edema
symptoms.pattern: Can be present in advanced stages with kidney or heart involvement

required: Persistent elevation of blood pressure (systolic ≥140 mmHg and/or diastolic ≥90 mmHg)
supportive: Presence of symptoms like shortness of breath, edema
